name: Hexed (itch) (Deleptual, tastyZounds)
description:
Made in 48 Hours for the Kenney Game Jam 2020 from the Deleptual Game Jam Team. No artists this time, just the programmer and sound folks!

HEXED!

Controls:
W,A,S,D to pan the camera around
MouseWheel to zoom in and out
Left click to select objects on the map to bring up their information
Right click to clear whatever you have selected

Instructions:
Use your curses to fully corrupt the land. When you have used all of your magic end the day and watch how your actions affect the world and its inhabitants. Can you curse the entire land before the town can retaliate?
Complete quests to progress and unlock new curses.

Credits:
Programming & Design: Eric Blanchard
Sound & Music: TastyZounds
Visual Art: Kenney
